thread.title: jerhag
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by jerhag

author: jerhag
title: jerhag
text:
Since this was my first order I have to admit that I was a bit concerned but was very pleasantly surprised when my order was delivered today.
The precise mat cutting and quality was the best I've ever seen. The delivery was much sooner than I expected along with the extra care in packaging. Also the website made it very easy to order!
Keep up the good work guys!
